item.title: Learning Hugo
item.description: Essential Commands // To start a project hugo new site first_site // To run server -D to show drafts hugo server -D // To create a post dirname optional hugo new dirname/post_name.md Add a theme to config.toml theme = "theme-name" Content Organization // Create this to make /dir1/dir2 // accessible hugo new dir1/dir2/_index.md Archetypes You can change the archetypes to change the front matter defaults. Like dir1.md. If directroy exists, it will be used.

item.title: WebGL 3D Animation
item.description: Source Code Sonat Uzun and I created 3D keyframe animations with WebGL. It is possible to save/load keyframes to create different animations with this model. We created the model using primitives and hierarchy.

item.title: Unity Gyroscope Demo
item.description: Made a basic roll-a-ball level with Unity. It used gyroscope sensors of the phone to controll the ball.

item.title: CRSG Author Module
item.description: Code Review Serious Game Author Module was my summer 2020 internship project. I created a serious game used in teaching code review process. Used JS, Ace Editor Library, Judge0 API, Ajax, Firebase.

item.title: Combining Game
item.description: Source Code This is a Doodle God like game made with Java. You can combine elements to create new elements in the game. It also features a game editor in which you can create your game content such as new elements and recipes. Players can see available elements. Player can selectt an element by clicking on it. By selecting a second element, players can attempt combining them. If the combinati is sucessful, a new element can be unlocked.

item.title: Tsu
item.description: Made an Android application for travel guidance as a group of six. The program has trivia about countries, a flexible dictionary, world clocks. Gained experience in deployment and improving Android cross-device compatibility. Detailed Info

item.title: WebGL Ray Tracer
item.description: Source Code Sonat Uzun and I created an interative, procedurally generated ray tracer with WebGL. It can display triangles, spheres and cubes. It has numerous options. Randomized trace order randomizes pixel rendering order. This results in blurry images instead of slow scans. Use texture creates the spheres with a checkers pattern texture. Moving spheres makes the spheres move in a random direction. Add options create a random sized/colored shape in a random location on screen.

item.title: Turkish Checkers
item.description: I created a Turkish Checkers game with AI. It uses the minimax algorithm.

item.title: Augcards
item.description: This is our Senior project. It is a mobile AR card game creation tool. Detailed Info

item.title: Catan
item.description: Made a computer adaptation of Catan game as a group of five for Object-Oriented Software Engineering class. Worked with Sockets and Threads. Mainly worked on the networking part. More Info

item.title: My Favorite Animes
item.description: I ranked my favorite animes from worst to best. Cowboy Bebop It has a perfect setting and atmosphere. I very much like the world they created in Cowboy Bebop. It’s weakness is it’s low continuity in my opinion. When you finish an episode, Cowboy Bebop never gives you a reason to watch the next episode. There are no cliffhangers. Yet, I strongly recommend Cowboy Bebop because it has good characters, cool storylines and an amazing setting.
